text: Top 3 Data Analyst Hard Skills: 1. SQL - Creating statements and queries to clean data, exporting to excel for reports and visualizations, automation, creating reports, sending e-mails. 2. Python - Data visualization, automation 3. Excel - Makes communication convenient.
